description:
This plugin adds additional useful input content formats that you can use to restrict certain kinds of characters to be typed into inputs.

🪶 Simple - zero configuration, straightforward usage

This plugin works without the use of an element plugin. Instead it's a simple set of actions that are immediately available upon installing.

Demo can be found here 👉 https://input-content-formats.bubbleapps.io/version-test

Editor can be found here 👉 https://bubble.io/page?id=input-content-formats
name: Input Content Formats
plugin_instructions:
1. Install the plugin

2. Find the input you want to format

3. Go ahead and add an HTML ID to the input

4. Run the correct 'Format ➝ X' action with the ID

That's it!
